PerfectNetExp.abs: witches 扫帚病, witchgrass 黍属, witches 疯病

means.word_mean: 1. North American grass with slender brushy panicles; often a weed on cultivated land
2. European grass spreading rapidly by creeping rhizomes; naturalized in North America as a weed
